Package com.lista2.controllers

Class LoanController

java.lang.Object
com.lista2.controllers.LoanController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/loan") public class LoanController extends Object
Controller class for managing loans.

  • Method Details

    • addLoan

      @PostMapping("/add") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_LIBRARIAN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addLoan(@RequestBody Loan loan)
      Adds a new loan.
      Parameters:
      loan - The loan to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation.

    • deleteLoan

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{loanId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_LIBRARIAN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteLoan(@PathVariable Integer loanId)
      Deletes a loan by its ID.
      Parameters:
      loanId - The ID of the loan to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation.

    • getAllLoans

      @GetMapping("/getAll") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_LIBRARIAN\')") @ResponseBody public Iterable<Loan> getAllLoans()
      Retrieves all loans.
      Returns:
      Iterable containing all loans.

    • getMyLoans

      @GetMapping("/getMyLoans") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_READER\')") @ResponseBody public List<Loan> getMyLoans()
      Retrieves loans associated with the current user.
      Returns:
      List containing the loans of the current user.

    • updateBookReturnDate

      @PostMapping("/returnDate/{loanID}/{date}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_LIBRARIAN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateBookReturnDate(@PathVariable Integer loanID, @PathVariable Date date)
      Updates the return date of a book for a loan.
      Parameters:
      loanID - The ID of the loan.
      date - The new return date.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation.
